teams.name: Kiva Buddhists
teams.description: We are Buddhists of all variety, but focus here is on the way of the Boddhisatva.

teams.name: Friends of Mission Belt Co
teams.loan_because: We want to give people a hand up, not a hand out, so that they can become self-sufficient and break the poverty cycle.
teams.description: We support Mission Belt Co and its Mission to fight global hunger by donating proceeds from their awesome no-holes belts

teams.name: KiVegas (Las Vegas Kiva)
teams.loan_because: It is our way of paying back for the millions of visitors to Las Vegas and the hope that many others might one day visit Las Vegas or basically a more productive way to invest funds we might otherwise lose at the craps table.
teams.description: Those who love Las Vegas, and those beloved of Las Vegas
